caption:
Table 1. The training was carried 
out on 64 Nvidia Tesla V100 32G GPU cards. It 
takes about 3 weeks for the 1.6B parameter model 
to accomplish the curriculum learning process.
Table 2: Self-chat evaluation results, with best value written in bold.
Table 3: Chinese interactive evaluation results, with best value written in bold.

Table 4: Static evaluation results, with best value writ-
ten in bold.

Table 4. It can be observed that 
PLATO-2 is able to produce coherent, informative 
and engaging responses under different chat sce-
narios.
Table 5: Thoroughness with regard to the start topic.

Table 6: Comparison of different score functions in re-
sponse selection, with best value written in bold.
